data.title: Tuition
data.text:
Fall 2024 and Spring 2025 Tuition Rates

Full-Time Credit Fall and Spring Enrollment

Part-Time Credit Evening, Weekend, Summer, and Winter Enrollment

International Students

Tuition rates are the same as out-of-state tuition rates listed above.

FIT in Italy Students

Additional fees apply to your student account.

Resident Tuition Rates

To qualify for New York state resident tuition rates, you must meet residency requirements. Students who meet these requirements and live outside of New York City must file a Certificate of Residence from their home county. Students who do not meet these requirements or do not file a Certificate of Residence will be billed at the non-resident rate.

See: Residency Requirements

Newly matriculated students, including visiting and new matriculates to the upper division, are required to make a non-refundable tuition deposit of $150 as soon as they are notified of admissions to confirm acceptance. Tuition and fees are subject to change without prior notice at the discretion of the college Board of Trustees.

Noncredit Tuition Rates

Tuition for noncredit courses, lectures, laboratories, and workshops are billed at various rates. Please visit Continuing and Professional Studies for more information.
